# Punisher: War Zone (soundtrack)

}}
| rev2 = CHARTattack
| rev2Score =
}}
Punisher: War Zone â€“ Original Motion Picture Soundtrack is the soundtrack for the film Punisher: War Zone, the album was released on November 25, 2008. The soundtrack includes the original track "War Zone", written for and inspired by the film, by musician Rob Zombie. An online contest was held by Lionsgate, and led to 7 Days Away (a band local to Connersville, IN) taking first place with the track "Take Me Away".

Reception
The soundtrack reached the number 23 slot on ''Billboard's'' Top Independent Albums chart.
